name: Avantar
description:
This a fun and calm casual puzzle about an ant that carries leaves with oddly convenient arrows.

 You have to help the ant collect all the mysterious floating sugar and get to the anthill, without being stung by the bees and other evil insects in the yard. Use the mouse to position the ant and the leafs. To control the ant movement you place the leaf with the arrow in the direction that you want it to move. This game project was made in 5 days for the Moonlight Game Jam and there are for now 10 playable levels.

Credits
  • Jônatas Lopes
  • Thiago Moura
  • Gustavo Salmeron (music)
